summary: A unit‑test collection that validates the XPO trainer’s ability to perform model training under different configurations, including parameter‑efficient fine‑tuning, use of a reference model, and custom PEFT settings, as well as its judge‑training workflow.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the XPO training pipeline for production deployments, ensuring that fine‑tuning and evaluation mechanisms work as expected across varied setups.
